Settings created.

main.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Save progress and quit?
main.textReverted: Text was reverted to the original state
main.locationButtonTitle: Search only in the current file (Alt + L)
main.missingTranslationDir: 'translation' directory is missing. Project won't be initialized.
main.missingOriginalDir: 'original' directory is missing. Project won't be initialized.
main.missingTranslationSubdirs: 'translation' directory's subdirectories 'maps', 'other' and 'plugins' are missing. Project won't be initialized.
main.noProjectSelected: No project selected. Select the project directory, using 'open folder' button in the left-top corner. Directory must contain directories 'original' and 'translation' (with 'maps', 'other' and 'plugins' subdirectories, if it's RPG Maker MV or MZ, or 'maps' and 'other', if it's RPG Maker XP, VX, VX Ace).

about.about: Program is written all by myself.

hotkeys.hotkeys:
Digits from "1" to "+" - Open different files to edit
Tab - Open the panel for selecting files
Ctrl + S - Save the translation files
Ctrl + F - Focus on the search field
R - Open the search panel
Alt + Enter - Jump to the textarea below the focused
Ctrl + Enter - Jump to the textarea above the focused
Esc - If focused element is the textarea, remove the focus, else exit from editing mode
Alt + C, if you are NOT focused on the textarea - Compile translation to JSON files
Alt + C, Alt + W, Alt + R, Alt + L, Alt + T, while you are focused on the search field - toggle case, whole text, regular expressions, only current file, and only translation text search respectively
LMB on the search result - scroll into the view of the result element
RMB on the search result - replace matching text of this element with the one that's currently entered into the replace field
LMB on the log result - scroll into the view of the earlier changed element
RMB on the log result - revert changed element to the original state
Ctrl + G - open the input field for jumping to specific row

help.helpTitle: How to use; what to do; where to click?
help.help:
Program is shipped without translation files. You can parse any game's files using CLI tool from the same repository to use in this program.
To start the project and begin translation, use "open folder" button in the left-top corner.
Program regularly creates backups of translation files in "project_folder/backups" path, period of backup and max number of backups can be controlled in the options. By default, the program creates backups every 60 seconds.
When you're saving changes in the program, all translation files will be written in the "project_folder/translation" folder.
To save your project changes, just press the save button or use Ctrl + S shortcut. It will automatically save your project, and when you start the program again, you can continue from where you left off.
To compile your translation into game's JSON files, just press the compile button or use Alt + C shortcut. Make sure to save before you compile your translation. It will create fully functional JSON files in the "project_folder/data" folder.
You can read this manual again or get help about program's hotkeys by selecting "About" and "Hotkeys" top menu options respectively.
